      • GeoCodingService

    • Method Detail

      • processActivities

        public void processActivities(java.util.Set<java.lang.Long> activityIds)
        Add activities to be geo coded as part of the current process. If the same activity is added twice, previous geo coding information about activity is removed and the activity is geo coded again.
        Parameters:
        activityIds - activities to geo code
        Throws:
        GeoCodingNotAvailableException - if geo coding is in use by someone else
        GeneralGeoCodingException - if activity cannot be loaded or it already has locations assigned

      • getGeoCodingProcess

        public GeoCodingProcess getGeoCodingProcess()
        Returns geo coding process. Also, updates activities that were geo coded.
        Returns:
        geo coding process if the process was started or null if geo coding process did not start yet
        Throws:
        GeoCodingNotAvailableException - if geo coding is in use by someone else

      • cancelGeoCoding

        public void cancelGeoCoding()
        Accepted locations are not saved.
